title: Shoshie
snippet: A good app, however I would like to know if or and how you can change the colours of the pieces, but if you cannot I would recommend adding that in the next update, I appreciate there are no ads too. Normally, I hate chess, but this app has increased my interest in the game. The only problem my mom and I have found is we have gotten the gold membership, but we are having trouble unsubscribeing. Otherwise a grate app love the puzzles and videos and games with real people, I highly recommend! ‚ôüÔ∏è‚ôüÔ∏è

title: Jefferey Reese
snippet: uninstalling. The latest update that forces animations with distracting movement and sounds is intolerable. Used to like it before.
response: {'title': 'Chess.com', 'snippet': 'We\'re sorry to hear you\'re having difficulty adjusting the sounds, Jefferey. Here\'s how to mute them! Log into your account from the ChessKid.com website and click on the "Settings" wheel next to your profile picture. Next, in the area that says "Sounds", toggle that button to "Off", and then click "Save" at the bottom of the page :)', 'date': 'October 10, 2023', 'iso_date': '2023-10-10T00:55:42Z'}

title: Ashley Mancini
snippet: We couldn't play two players and have the game synced to each other because every time we added one the other one got kicked off or it got really laggy

title: Clark Pearson
snippet: Great games, tutorials, and puzzles for kids AND their parents

title: Rakesh Kumar
snippet: I am happy to see this this app because it is good to teach to chess to everyone in English language. I downloaded this app because I have seen 4 time again - again rating and I impressed by this rating but my mind occurred doubt but when I see by youtube about this app I really so much got happy. So, I downloaded this app to learn chess . But one problem is that this app upgradation cost is high.
response: {'title': 'Chess.com', 'snippet': "We're glad you're enjoying playing and improving your chess skills on ChessKid! title: Ashley Ward
snippet: Seems like it works well, except for one thing: I got this app to play chess with my sister and her son. When I try to become friends with my sister, it says I can only become friends with kids. When I try to become friends with her son, it says I can only become friends with adults. WHICH IS IT???
response: {'title': 'Chess.com', 'snippet': "Thank you for your review! When playing on ChessKid, a Kid may only play chess with their Guardians' linked accounts. Here is an article with information: https://support.chesskid.com/en/articles/8863569-how-to-connect-to-my-kid-through-guardianship. Please visit this link to contact us for assistance, we're here to help: www.chesskid.com/support", 'date': 'August 19, 2024', 'iso_date': '2024-08-19T21:40:45Z'}

title: Gl√ºck Meister
snippet: Super simple and good app. Nobody can chat with my child or make a friend request, which is great. Friends can still be made after a good match by requesting a rematch, but the focus is purely play and I like that a lot. The upgraded version must be worth it, but we aren't that far yet. Highly recommended.
response: {'title': 'Chess.com', 'snippet': 'Hi there‚ù£Ô∏è Thank you so much for this feedback! We appreciate your support üòÅ.', 'date': 'September 27, 2023', 'iso_date': '2023-09-27T00:05:27Z'}

title: Klari Szenasi
snippet: My kid likes it, but the software has serious flaws that haven't been fixed for a long time. E.g. it often gets stuck in lessons, you need to quit and reenter. The lesson videos often just don't play. After renewing my subscription, we are no longer able to start lessons. You need to remember a generated user name, you cannot use your email to log in, and the reminder does not work. I wrote to them, but their solutions do not work on my Samsung Galaxy A12 with latest updates.
response: {'title': 'Chess.com', 'snippet': "Thank you for this feedback :) I'm sorry to hear about your poor user experience! I would suggest making sure you‚Äôre on the latest version of the operating system available through the App Store. Please email us at support@chesskid.com so that we can help you with resetting the password and any other issues you might be encountering :)", 'date': 'February 08, 2023', 'iso_date': '2023-02-08T19:26:58Z'}

title: Anish PV
snippet: Missing videos for below important topics - Discovered check, X-ray attack, Overload, Domination, Invasion, Queen activity, Blockade, Key squares, Diagonal opposition, Shoudlering, Karpov Distance.

title: Mateo Escobar
snippet: i practice alot of it since I have a chess tournament coming up.

title: A Google user
snippet: My previous feedback is below where I gave disappointing rating due to payment issue. Now that's being sorted and my extra payment refunded by ChessKid, I have given 5 star. There is no issue with the application itself. One of the best I would say. My son is enjoying it again. Thanks to ChessKid for sorting out the payment issue. _____________________________________ I have given disappointing rating because I purchased Gold membership for one year few months back for my son. Initially it worked fine then my Gold membership revoked automatically. I sent many emails. Initially there was response too and they said they will fix it but never fixed it. Infact they stopped responding. Very disappointed with their support. And now today again I paid full one year amount to buy it again. So double the amount paid. 4-6 months lost.
response: {'title': 'Chess.com', 'snippet': 'Hello Subodh, We apologize for the lack of communication and for the Gold membership issues! I have fixed the account from the first purchase so you now have Gold. I have also extended the expiration date so the membership will start over today and end 10/2019. Your second payment will be refunded and you should see that in 3-5 days! - LadyWolf', 'date': 'October 23, 2018', 'iso_date': '2018-10-23T00:24:10Z'}

title: Rajendra Bhatt
snippet: What a nonsense game . here in this app we can move the king without check. How can it be possible? The king can only move when someone gives you a check. And if the king is left then the player is said to be lose. But in this game when the king is left the player is still playing. So please improve this game üôè
response: {'title': 'Chess.com', 'snippet': 'Thank you for this feedback. On ChessKid we use the standard rules of chess that are used around the world! According to the official rules, the King may move even if he is not currently in check. The King may not be left in check. Here is a link with info: www.chesskid.com/learn/articles/how-to-play-chess', 'date': 'August 26, 2024', 'iso_date': '2024-08-26T15:50:49Z'}

title: Kalpesh M
snippet: Hi I really love this app and there's so much to learn in a fun way for me. I have came up to the point where I want to learn but the app is restricted. We have the app at chess club at school but the school has stopped chess club because of Covid. The price is very expensive for kids to upgrade. Other then that one thing the app is a great way for kids to learn and engage the at of chess. If it's not the cost involved I would give 5 stars.

title: Shiseida Hughes
snippet: The app provides a fun way to learn how to play chess.

title: sadhu gupta
snippet: I really like the game but there is one problem with your app. first when I challenge people and they lose on time sometimes the game says that he or she didn't lose and then they could continue the game and pls fix this issue üò≠ü•∫üôè only then I'll rate it five stars and also there is one more problem I can't find a button that activates agreeing with that move or seeing what mistakes you did
response: {'title': 'Chess.com', 'snippet': 'Thank you for the feedback! :) We have updated our settings! Working hard for that extra star :)', 'date': 'June 23, 2024', 'iso_date': '2024-06-23T20:07:52Z'}

title: A Google user
snippet: This app is terrible. I have two kids that want to play against each other, but there seems to be no way to handle friends on the app. You have to play on the website instead (which has its own problems, such as an unintuitive interface, and support pictures that are different to what we see). The app just does random challenges. Otherwise, everything else seems ok.

title: A Google user
snippet: Terrible. The free bots are super easy to beat (AI avoids losing pieces vs. checkmate), even for my 7 y/o. Playing him on the same device, there's no tabletop mode. Board flips after each turn, and if you undo a move it gets out of sync. Very disorienting. Playing online is the worst. Won't notify me when a move is made, and won't update the board. Have to back out to the home screen and go back into the game. Now, at bedtime, sending me notifications for game that ended 4 hours ago. Annoying.

title: Mark Foulds
snippet: Really nice app and well put together. Only two suggestions: I like the grey dots signifying move options but it could be clearer when a opponents piece is on one of the dotted squares. The bot opponents are really animated which made the game engaging for my five year old. The only problem was that when she beat 'Qwerty' he started to cry! After that she refused to beat him in the next game as she didnt want to upset Qwerty!

title: Yehudit Hasin
snippet: This is ridiculously user unfriendly app. I got the gold subscription, but that one is on apple...does not extend to my Android phone! Yep. It also does not extend to my attached kid account! Navigation is super NOT intuitive and after spending hours I still did not find how to go back in lessons and puzzles. My 5 year old definitely won't be able to learn anything. Oh and the kid must READ English WELL to be able to interact with the app. Will cancel...

title: A Google user
snippet: My son is 6 years old. He started to learn with free chess kid on March 2018, and then bought a membership on September. He learned sooo fast. He is on level King 29 now, he can beat 11 years old boy!!! His coach said that he is a strong player, he cant beleve how fast he learned. I really recomended this app, they make learning chess really fun and easy to understand. Great job Chess Kid!!!
response: {'title': 'Chess.com', 'snippet': "Thank you so much! We're extremely happy to hear how well your son is doing! Let us know if you have any suggestions for improvement, support@chesskid.com :)", 'date': 'December 15, 2018', 'iso_date': '2018-12-15T22:20:49Z'}

title: Corey Alphonso
snippet: My son signed up for an account which I ended up upgrading to a gold membership. Shortly after, my son ended up getting locked out of the account for putting in the wrong password too many times. I contacted support who responded to me one time but since then(9 days ago) has not responded to any of my multiple emails to try to resolve my issue. Edit- support contacted me and resolved my issue so I have adjusted my rating.
response: {'title': 'Chess.com', 'snippet': "Hello, Corey! I'm sorry to hear that your family is having a hard time accessing the gold account. Please let me know if I can help you with anything else.", 'date': 'April 14, 2023', 'iso_date': '2023-04-14T18:00:27Z'}

title: Ishaan P.S
snippet: I love the app, very user friendly, very good app for learning chess for your kids, has lessons, has bot mode and a safe multiplayer. But I experienced a bug while playing bot mode in pc version, while playing, I put check to the king but the bot continued to move something else, ignoring the checkmate. I took screenshot just coz it looked funny lol but I definitely recommend this app.

title: Sattvik Trivedi
snippet: very good game, but one very BIG problem. when I reach a rating of 1050 plus, I only get 2 or 3 points for winning, minus 6 for a stalemate done by me to the opponent and minus 12 or 13 at losing. please check the system. it should be like this + 15 for winning +10 for a stalemate done by you +1 or 2 for a draw by agreement or sufficient material -5 if opponent stalemates you -10 if you lose I hope this is done thank you!

title: Michaela Austin
snippet: I'm vision impaired. This app is not accessible and does not work with large fonts. You are not able to see all the things you need to fill out to create an account rendering the app unusable. Very disappointing when developers don't test their apps with large fonts.

title: AARTI DESHMUKH
snippet: Hi team. My kid enjoyed playing chess with your app.The app page has advertised that a Gold membership will ensure unlimited access to the toughest bots, access to lessons and videos. So I have purchased Gold membership on Monthly renewal basis for which ‚Çπ669/- (INR) was deducted from my account. The purchase done on 14th March 2023. The app is acknowledging the Gold membership. But even after a Gold membership the bots are not accessible, still locked. Please look into the issue.
response: {'title': 'Chess.com', 'snippet': "Hello, Aarti! I'm sorry to hear about your limited bot access. Are you still having issues with this? If so, I would suggest writing to our Support team (please include your ChessKid username and the GPA number associated with your purchase) so that we can help you figure out what's happening in real time. Please email us at support@chesskid.com.", 'date': 'April 18, 2023', 'iso_date': '2023-04-18T16:40:44Z'}

title: Paul Fraser
snippet: Not actually for children. This game puts new 6 year olds against 1300+ ELO rated players over and over again even with a low ELO rating of 600. After losing every game he's played, my 6 year old doesn't want to play anymore. Gold status is very very buggy, half the time it didn't apply correctly. Also, kids can't read the instructions in the lesson exercises which are written in high school+ reading levels (please narrate!!)

title: A Google user

I updated to the gold level but my son nor I show any record of doing so. updated...chess kid got back to me quickly and even with a hickup they helped get us set up. thank you! mybson truly enjoys this app with all the videos and games to play.

title: A Google user

Also there was no response to my request for a refund. This seems like a scam, where they take your money for a promised service without delivering said service. Bigger disappointment for my child.
